summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the Seattle Elections code, making technical amendments to update terminology and conform city law to state law where appropriate by amending sections 2.04.010, 2.04.060, 2.04.075, 2.04.090, 2.04.155, 2.04.156, 2.04.160, 2.04.165, 2.04.215, 2.04.220, 2.04.230, 2.04.250, 2.04.260, 2.04.265, 2.04.270, 2.04.280, 2.04.290, 2.04.320, 2.04.370, 2.04.375, 2.04.480, 2.04.500.
note: 2009 Ethics and Elections Code Cleanup Ordinance
